text:
Currently in pypi the latest version of the library is oauthlib 1.1.0.post1.. could we make an sdist oauthlib-1.1.0.post1.tar.gz also available so legacy installations can find the correct egg

Thanks 

Carlos
ps. the egg listed in pypi is oauthlib-1.1.0-1.tar.gz
